events.title: Paint Night
events.description: You' re on your own, kid, but not tonight—paint alongside fellow Swifties and let your artistic side shine! We'll host more exciting Swiftville events throughout November, but this paint night is "the best day" to start! So grab a brush, choose your favourite Taylor era for inspiration, and let’s "paint the whole town" together! See you there, Swifties!

events.title: Bracelet Making
events.description: Let's prepare for the eras tour!  Inspired by the empowering message from Taylor’s song "You’re On Your Own, Kid", we’re inviting all Swifties to come together, make friendship bracelets, and embrace the spirit of connection that defines the Swiftie community. Enter your information below to enter our giveaway!!

events.title: Eras Tour
events.description: Let's prepare for the eras tour! Can you guess?
